MemoryInfobox.description: 'The theater is a place for rowdy and bawdy fun. Common wine makes every play better.'
MemoryInfobox.type: The Lost Tales of Greece, Support

General_Description: '''Everyman's Drink''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: At the request of the actor [[Thespis]] and his aide [[Rhodanthe]], Kassandra was tasked with securing wine for the audience.
Section_Dialogue:
Approaching the [[Stable of Ares]], Kassandra observed the building.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's the stables. The wine in there should be good enough for [[horse]]s, at least.''
Kassandra infiltrated the stables, and found the wine.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's the wine Thespis wanted me to bring for the audience... It doesn't smell great, but it should be reasonable.''
Section_Trivia: *If players choose to complete this mission, the other support quest [[A Sophisticated Tipple]] will disappear upon completion.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
